participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, loves to reminisce about childhood memories and enjoys music and dance.
participant_1.background: i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often finds solace in nature and has a passion for animal rights.
participant_2.background: the holidays make me depressed. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair.
